summary: Asian Hawk (Jackie Chan) and his bumbling sidekick are sent on a quest through Europe to find a mysterious treasure held by a shadowy organization of monks.
cast: Jackie Chan|Alan Tam|Lola Forner|Rosamund Kwan|Ken Boyle|John Ladalski|Robert O'Brien|Bozidar Smiljanic|Anthony Chan|Danny Yip|Carina Lau|Clarence Yiu-leung Fok|Kenny Bee|Bennett Pang|Boris Gregoric|Marcia Chisholm|Linda Denley|Stephanie Evans|Alicia Shonte|Vivian Wickliffe|Stephen Apostolina|Steve Bulen|Richard Cansino|Steve Cassling|Jake Eberle|Richard Epcar|Michael Forrest|Bridget Hoffman|Patricia Lentz|Jonathan Nichols|Bob Papenbrook|Kirk Thornton|William Williams|Wayne Archer|Edowan Bersmea|Geoffrey Brown|Gary Carter|John Culkin|Mars|Pedro Massobrio|Matthew Oram|Alex Rodine|Dragomir Stanojevic|Bo Svenson|Grant Temple|Paco Yick
title: La armadura de Dios
